growthPara.text: A blend of our precious oils—with a lightweight finish and versatile styling benefits—to boost hair’s hydration, strength, and shine while reducing frizz.

reparationPara.text: Repair and strengthen dry damaged hair while keeping a balanced moisturization.

strengthenPara.text: Strengthens strands from the roots while stimulating the scalp and the oil restores shine and rebuilds hair elasticity.

hairSerumIngredientsPara.text: C10-13 Isoparaffin, C12-14 Isoparaffin, Dimethicone, Isopropyl Myristate, Fragrance, Marula Oil, Jojoba Oil, Glycine Max Extract, Anthemis Nobilis Flower Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Extract, Rosmarinus of Ficinalis Extract.

preCleansePara.text: Prior to showering, apply liberally throughout brushed hair. Rinse out before shampooing.

addedProtectionPara.text: Apply to towel-dried hair. Blow-dry as normal.

finishingTouchPara.text: Work into ends of hair to smooth out frizz and style. As a touch-up: Apply a drop to ends for a touch of shine anytime.

elixirSerumPara.text: Soins Karismä was on the search for the perfect blend to use in any occasion. We wanted to be able to use a product before, during or even after showering. After months of research and delicate selection of oils , we came up with the perfect solution. An exotic blend with Marula Oil that will hydrate with lightweight, promote touchable soft tresses, perfect for thin/fine hair, imparts rich hair with a luxurious scent! The perfect solution for all!

reviewsPara1.text: I LOVE THIS!!! Having fine hair that’s also super curly & frizzy (from bleaching) is a real challenge. This elixir is so light but penetrates the hair. My hair is moisturized but not weighed down at all although I use it almost daily! It leaves a beautiful, subtle shine without making it heavy or greasy and it’s got a very nice, light scent. It’s effectiveness is pretty unbelievable and I plan to use it forever!

reviewsPara2.text: I have super thin curly hair. The elixir serum surprised me because it has a nice scent with a proper consistency. Totally surprised, it left my hair looking natural, non-greasy and moisturized. Plus side, my hair feels stronger and not weighed down. I will finish the bottle and order another!

reviewsPara3.text: This oil made my hair so much softer. I love it! I put it on my hair after it’s dried and it smooths it out. This product is great, if not better than all of the other brands I have tried! I’m so glad I found this and the price is way lower than competing products.
